implementation_summary.problem: Tailwind CSS cannot generate dynamic class names at build time. For depth >= 6, classes like pl-26, pl-30 were not included in the CSS bundle.
implementation_summary.solution: Replaced getIndentClass function with getIndentStyle function that returns inline styles (React.CSSProperties) with paddingLeft calculated dynamically.
changes: Replaced getIndentClass(depth) with getIndentStyle(depth) that returns { paddingLeft: `${0.5 + depth * 1}rem` }
Changed TreeNode from using className-based indentation to style-based indentation
Added maxVisualDepth (20) to prevent excessive indentation for deeply nested files
Updated existing indentation test to use toHaveStyle instead of toHaveClass
Added tests for depth 0, 1, and deep hierarchy (depth 6+)

message: TDD implementation completed successfully. Deep file hierarchy issue fixed by switching from Tailwind CSS classes to inline styles for indentation.
